name: painter
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 someone who paints pictures
portishead1/E+/GettyImages
someone whose job is to paint surfaces, such as walls and doors
alessandroguerriero/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
Examples
J.M.W. Turner is one of Britain's best-known landscape painters.a portrait paintera firm of painters and decoratorsan Impressionist painterHow do you make a living as a painter?
